Major_Arcs.title: Human Meteor's Adventures
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the adventures of the Human Meteor, starting with an underwater mystery, leading to a chase and confrontation, and eventually resolving a submarine threat and yacht intrigue.

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Mystery and Chase
sub_scenes.description: The story begins with an underwater scene and quickly transitions to a city chase involving Duke, playboys, and the G-Men, culminating in the Human Meteor's entry.

sub_scenes.title: Cop Shooters and Yacht Suspicion
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor deals with 'cop shooters', gets police appreciation, and then gets involved in a new case concerning a suspicious yacht and a Japanese submarine.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Infiltration and Submarine Encounter
sub_scenes.description: Duke and Toby plan to investigate the yacht. Toby infiltrates the yacht, faces danger, and reports a submarine sighting. Human Meteor intervenes.

narrative_arcs.title: Toby Infiltrates the Yacht and is Spotted
Human Meteor Responds to the Call

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Battle and Ship Attack
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor confronts the submarine crew underwater, leading to a battle involving torpedoes and culminating in an attack on the yacht.

narrative_arcs.title: Divers Identify and Target Human Meteor
Human Meteor Responds to Divers' Aggression
Diver's Threat and Human Meteor's Retaliation Hint
Spear Gun Attack and Cry for Help
Human Meteor's Torpedo Attack on Submarine
Human Meteor's Finishing Blow to Ship

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Investigation and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor investigates the yacht, discovers Peter's death, searches for a depth map, and resolves the yacht subplot, leading to a hospital visit and a domestic scene.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of Peter's Death on Yacht
Human Meteor Searches for Depth Map in Peter's Cabin
Evening Car Ride and Domestic Scene with Toby and Duke

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads and the Bus Company Conspiracy
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Liberty Lads and shifts to a domestic setting where boys uncover a Nazi sabotage plot connected to a bus company and confront the antagonists.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads vs. Nazis and Ambulance Arrival
sub_scenes.description: The Liberty Lads confront Nazis, and in a separate scene, boys observe an ambulance arriving at a house, setting up a new mystery.

sub_scenes.title: Wallet Investigation and Garage Interception
sub_scenes.description: The boys investigate a dropped wallet leading them to a garage where they observe a Marine saluting a civilian and are then intercepted by an officer.

narrative_arcs.title: Marine Salutes Civilian - Major Bronson Revealed
Arrival at the Garage and Interception

sub_scenes.title: Mr. Horst and Carbon Monoxide Plot
sub_scenes.description: The boys are taken to Mr. Horst and interrogated about the wallet, while associates overhear a sinister carbon monoxide murder plot.

narrative_arcs.title: Confirmation and Agreement on Carbon Monoxide Plan

sub_scenes.title: Chaos, Bronson's Threat, and Lawyer's Attack
sub_scenes.description: Fighting erupts, the boys are overpowered, Major Bronson threatens them, but suddenly his lawyer attacks, leading to Horst's men turning against Bronson.

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Help, Sabotage Plans, and Marine Barracks
sub_scenes.description: The boys decide to seek help, encounter a Marine sergeant, discover sabotage plans, and learn about the larger conspiracy just as urgent news reaches the Marine Barracks.

narrative_arcs.title: Plan to Seek Help and Sergeant Encounter
Urgent News and Car Crash at Barracks

sub_scenes.title: Office Defense and Marine Rescue
sub_scenes.description: Skip defends himself in the office while Major Bronson faces confrontation, leading to a Marine rescue and the dismantling of the Nazi spy ring.

narrative_arcs.title: Immediate Aid and Call for Ambulance

Major_Arcs.title: The Champ and Rosita's Kidnapping
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces 'The Champ' and his friend, who get entangled in the kidnapping of Rosita, the President's daughter, in a South American town, battling against Axis-linked bandits.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to The Champ and Military Suspicion
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of 'The Champ' and Henry in a South American town, followed by military interrogation due to suspicions related to Rosita's kidnapping.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Setting

sub_scenes.title: Kidnapping and Misguided Rescue
sub_scenes.description: El Tigre's men carjack 'The Champ' and Henry, taking them to a house where women mistakenly believe they are rescuers of Rosita.

narrative_arcs.title: El Tigre's Demands and Forced Carjacking
The Forced Drive and Destination Reveal

sub_scenes.title: Mama's Plea and Infiltration of Hideout
sub_scenes.description: Mama pleads for help to rescue Rosita, while in a parallel scene, a plan is hatched to infiltrate El Tigre's hideout, culminating in a confrontation with El Tigre.

sub_scenes.title: Confrontations and Rosita's Rescue
sub_scenes.description: Various confrontations occur while planning to rescue Rosita, eventually leading to her rescue and ongoing combat with enemies.

narrative_arcs.title: Claim of Identity Theft by Axis Agents
Rosita Held by Axis Agents, Rescue Plan
Escape to Citadel and Hotel Strategy

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Gratitude
sub_scenes.description: The immediate threat is dealt with, culminating in gratitude, recognition for 'Senor Champ', and the arrival of government troops, followed by a concluding scene of neighborly duty and future outlook.

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan and the Sub Detector Plans
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Devil Dog Dolan in a jungle fight, followed by a plot involving disobeyed orders, sub detector plans, and his capture and torture by enemy agents.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Introduction and Disobedience Report
sub_scenes.description: Devil Dog Dolan is introduced fighting in a jungle setting, followed by a report about his disobeyed orders and possession of sub detector plans.

sub_scenes.title: Captain's Reaction and Jungle Ambush
sub_scenes.description: Captain Lawton reacts sternly to Dolan's disobedience, while in a parallel scene, a jungle trek leads to a native ambush, and Dolan is captured.

narrative_arcs.title: Jungle River Journey and Perceived Danger

sub_scenes.title: Torture and Forced Compliance
sub_scenes.description: Grauer demands the sub detector plans, orders forced notes, and Dolan is tortured until he complies and writes a note.

sub_scenes.title: Arson and Native Attack
sub_scenes.description: Dolan continues setting fires as part of a plan to attack natives, justified by a sinister purpose, while Marines are implied to be starting an onslaught.

narrative_arcs.title: Marines' Onslaught and Grauer's Strategic Talk
Grauer's Dismissal and Native Hut Burning

sub_scenes.title: Native Camp Attack and Chief's Demise
sub_scenes.description: Dolan attacks a native camp, leading to a fight and the accidental death of the native chief, followed by native submission.

sub_scenes.title: Liberation and Father-Son Conflict Resolution
sub_scenes.description: Natives explain their situation and liberation, while on a ship, a father-son conflict unfolds and gets resolved through a fistfight and service discipline.

Major_Arcs.title: Twinkle Twins and the Banker's Murder
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the 'Twinkle Twins' and their investigation into the murder of banker Robert Burgess, leading them through newsrooms, police stations, and hospitals to uncover a racketeering plot.

sub_scenes.title: Story Introduction and Newsroom Briefing
sub_scenes.description: Introduction to the 'Twinkle Twins' story, followed by a briefing in the Weston newspaper office about the Robert Burgess murder case.

sub_scenes.title: Police Inquiry and Hospital Investigation
sub_scenes.description: The twins inquire at the police station, get a lead to the hospital, and visit Miss Reilly, uncovering a blood transfusion complication.

narrative_arcs.title: Police Station Inquiry and Hospital Lead
Hospital Visit and Discovery of Miss Reilly

sub_scenes.title: Racketeering Suspicions and Farnacci Link
sub_scenes.description: The twins suspect racketeering, decide to inform Elijah, and Dan makes a phone call, directing Elijah to investigate Farnacci's connections.

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Tom Reilly and Mrs. Murphy's Revelation
sub_scenes.description: The twins search for Tom Reilly, encounter him, and then speak with Mrs. Murphy who reveals crucial information about Farnacci and the murder.

narrative_arcs.title: Searching for Tom Reilly and Initial Encounter
Conversation with Mrs. Murphy about Farnacci

sub_scenes.title: Chase, Blockade, and Police Intervention
sub_scenes.description: A chase ensues after Tom Reilly, leading to a human blockade, vigilante action, mob justice, and finally, police intervention and arrests.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival and Chase of Tom Reilly

sub_scenes.title: Medical Emergency and Community Blood Donation
sub_scenes.description: Focus shifts to medical emergency, ambulance rush, hospital wait, blood transfusion needs, community response, and finally, Lassie Reilly's recovery.

narrative_arcs.title: Rushed to Ambulance and Onward Concern
Hospital Wait and Blood Transfusion News
Community Rushes to Donate and Hospital Anxiety
Blood Type Confirmation, Transfusion Preparation, and Recovery

sub_scenes.title: Justice and Celebration
sub_scenes.description: The quest for justice for Lassie Reilly leads to police action, a poolroom raid, interrogation, and finally, a birthday celebration marking Lassie's recovery and a happy resolution.

narrative_arcs.title: Threats and Determination to Capture Farnacci
Police Respond and Arrest the Murderer
